SELECT A.MID, A.MKEY, A.CO_NM FROM ( SELECT IFNULL(MK.MID, '') AS MID , IFNULL(MK.MKEY, '') AS MKEY , IFNULL(M.CO_NM, '') AS CO_NM FROM TB_MBS_KEY MK LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_MBS M ON MK.MID = M.MID
WHERE 1=1
AND MK.MID = #{merId}
UNION ALL SELECT '' AS MID , '' AS MKEY , '' AS CO_NM ) A ORDER BY A.MID DESC LIMIT 1

, (SELECT AL.DESC1 FROM ( SELECT CD.* FROM TB_CODE CD WHERE CD.CODE_CL='0031' AND CD.USE_FLG ='1' AND CD.CODE2= '*'

SELECT CD.* FROM TB_CODE CD WHERE CD.CODE_CL='0051' AND CD.USE_FLG ='1' AND CD.CODE2= '*'

AND TH.VID = #{MER_ID}

, (SELECT DESC1 FROM TB_CODE WHERE CODE_CL='0001' AND CODE1=M.BANK_CD AND USE_FLG = '1' LIMIT 1) AS BANK_NM , M.ACCNT_NM , M.ACCNT_NO
, (SELECT IFNULL(FEE, 0) AS FEE FROM TB_STMT_FEE WHERE ID = M.MID AND PM_CD = '01' AND SPM_CD = '00' AND CP_CD = '00' AND ID_CD = '1' AND USE_ST_TYPE != '2' AND DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), "%Y%m%d") BETWEEN FR_DT AND TO_DT LIMIT 1 ) AS EROM_FEE
, M.CAN_PW
, M.CONT_EMP_NM , M.CONT_EMP_EMAIL , M.CONT_EMP_TEL , M.CONT_EMP_HP
, M.TECH_EMP_NM , M.TECH_EMP_EMAIL , M.TECH_EMP_TEL , M.TECH_EMP_CP
, M.STMT_EMP_NM , M.STMT_EMP_EMAIL , M.STMT_EMP_TEL , M.STMT_EMP_CP
